simnibs.optimization.opt_struct.TmsFlexOptimization¶

class simnibs.optimization.opt_struct.TmsFlexOptimization(matlab_struct=None)¶

Class that defines a TMS flex optimization

str

Type:

str

The optimization method ‘emag’ or ‘distance’

Type:

str

roi¶

The target region of interest for the ‘emag’ optimization

Type:

RegionOfInterest
